attributes.action: Improve the NHS mental health services! (camhs, ect)
attributes.additional_details: Services such as CAMHS desperately need change. They are quite clearly underfunded, and understaffed. The services are overstretched and need changing ASAP. This effects the future of our generation, and the generations to come. Please, do it for the future of our nation.
attributes.background: Give more funding to mental health services- particularly the youth services- as well as improved standards for these services.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617699
